alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elmore and central Owyhee Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hinton Reservoir, or 23 miles southwest of Mountain Home, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bruneau, Mountain Home Air Force Base, Bruneau Sand Dunes and C J Strike Reservoir around 410 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
